page.shortlink: api client api a5 spinlist class

argument.name: containerId
argument.description: The ID of the element the spin list should be rendered in.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data to populate the spin list with. Each item can be a *[link:A5.SpinList Item Object]* object, or a string. If a string is passed in, then the HTML and value of the list item will be the value of the string.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: Settings for the spin list. This will override the initial values of the properties of the A5.SpinList class.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use on the spin list.

property.name: override
property.description: The overrides to use on the spin list.

property.name: inputId
property.description: The ID of the INPUT into which the value of the spin list should be set every time the spin list value changes.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the spin list container element.

property.name: disabledClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the spin list container element when the spin list has been disabled.

property.name: className
property.description: The default class name to put on a spin list item element.

property.name: height
property.description: The height of the spin list. If an integer number is passed in, then the number of items displayed above and below the selected item will be that value (for instance, the default value of '1' means that three items will be visible - one above, one below, and the selected item). A measured height can be passed in as a string with CSS units (for instance '100px').

property.name: onBeforePopulate
property.description: Event fired before the spin list is populated with data. If a value of false is returned by the function the populate will not be done.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data the spin list is being populated with.

property.name: onPopulate
property.description: Event fired when the spin list is populated with data.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data the spin list was populated with.

property.name: onSelect
property.description: Event fired when an item in the spin list is selected.

property.name: onChange
property.description: Event fired when the value of the spin list changes.

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the spin list.
